title: If Shift_Key held when Firefox Starts, launch `Firefox -p` else `Firefox`
content: I want to launch firefox_Profile_Manager if when `SHIFT_KEY` is held, is there a way to do it through Bash? Or anyother way?
creator: darkphoenix534

title: when I switch to full screen other displays go blank.
content:
In the most recent version of the firefox when I switch to full screen other displays go blank. I'm using firefox on a macbook and before updating firefox I had no problem.

is there any workaround to this problem?
creator: roxane.serine

title: The tab bar fades when the window is not focused, and other unwelcome changes with a new update.
content:
I have some new issues after a recent update.

The tab bar fades when the window isn't focused. I certainly didn't have it set to do that before, and I have had no luck finding the setting for it. Tell me what the setting is?

Another I'd like to know the setting for, is the behavior of the address bar. It used to always be white, and now it's gray unless I'd entering something in it. I'd like to switch the setting back to the other way.

I've tried hunting for the settings for these things, but it has not been intuitive for me, and I guess I keep overlooking the pertinent settings somehow. Please tell me what parts of the settings page, or what about:config entries, will get things put back as I had them?
creator: PAGulley

title: What is this purple icon that suddenly appeared in and behind my browser windows?
content:
Macbook Air, Sonoma 14.1.2, second monitor connected via hdmi. This oval purple icon showing a person in front of a screen suddenly appeared in and behind upper left hand corner of window, and is now in all my windows. (see attached image)

What is it? What does it signify? Thanks for your help! Kathleen
creator: thestrangerkmc
